attributes.action: Grant a Kinghthood to Bruce Forsyth for his services to entertainment and charity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bruce Forsyth (real name Bruce Joseph Forsyth Johnson ) is arguably one of Britains finest entertainers.  Despite being over 80 years old, he still commands a special place in the entertainment world.  His landmark 65 years in show-business, as well as his support for various charities, notably through the Variety Club, marks him out as long overdue for this honour.  Please support this petition.  Thank you for reading it.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
